verses.verse: Not to us, O LORD, <WH3068> not to us, but to your name <WH8034> give glory, <WH3519> for your mercy, <WH2617> and for your truth's <WH571> sake.
Why <WH4100> should the heathen <WH1471> say, <WH559> Where <WH346> is now <WH4994> their God? <WH430>
But our God <WH430> is in the heavens: <WH8064> he has done <WH6213> whatever <WH3605> <WH834> he has pleased. <WH2654>
Their idols <WH6091> are silver <WH3701> and gold, <WH2091> the work <WH4639> of men's <WH120> hands. <WH3027>
They have mouths, <WH6310> but they speak <WH1696> not: eyes <WH5869> have they, but they see <WH7200> not:
They have ears, <WH241> but they hear <WH8085> not: noses <WH639> have they, but they smell <WH7306> not:
They have hands, <WH3027> but they handle <WH4184> not: feet <WH7272> have they, but they walk <WH1980> not: neither <WH3808> speak <WH1897> they through their throat. <WH1627>
They that make <WH6213> them are like <WH3644> to them; so is every <WH3605> one that trusts <WH982> in them.
O Israel, <WH3478> trust <WH982> you in the LORD: <WH3068> he is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
O house <WH1004> of Aaron, <WH175> trust <WH982> in the LORD: <WH3068> he is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
You that fear <WH3373> the LORD, <WH3068> trust <WH982> in the LORD: <WH3068> he is their help <WH5828> and their shield. <WH4043>
The LORD <WH3068> has been mindful <WH2142> of us: he will bless <WH1288> us; he will bless <WH1288> the house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> he will bless <WH1288> the house <WH1004> of Aaron. <WH175>
He will bless <WH1288> them that fear <WH3373> the LORD, <WH3068> both small <WH6996> and great. <WH1419>
The LORD <WH3068> shall increase <WH3254> you more and more, you and your children. <WH1121>
You are blessed <WH1288> of the LORD <WH3068> which made <WH6213> heaven <WH8064> and earth. <WH776>
The heaven, <WH8064> even the heavens, <WH8064> are the LORD's: <WH3068> but the earth <WH776> has he given <WH5414> to the children <WH1121> of men. <WH120>
The dead <WH4191> praise <WH1984> not the LORD, <WH3050> neither <WH3808> any <WH3605> that go <WH3381> down <WH3381> into silence. <WH1745>
But we will bless <WH1288> the LORD <WH3050> from this time <WH6258> forth and for ever more. <WH5769> Praise <WH1984> the LORD. <WH3050>
